LanguageData.SP_BioTail.label: Bionic tail (Sheepawn)
LanguageData.SP_BioTail.description: A bionic tail attachment for Sheepawn. An artificial nerve within responds to the wearer's will and is capable of precise movements.
LanguageData.SP_BioHorn.label: Bionic horn (Sheepawn)
LanguageData.SP_BioHorn.description: A bionic horn attachment for Sheepawn. Guaranteed to be big and beautiful.
LanguageData.SP_WoodHorn.label: Wooden horn (Sheepawn)
LanguageData.SP_WoodHorn.description: A wooden horn attachment for Sheepawn. It offers temporary relief and is relatively durable.
LanguageData.SP_FakeTail.label: Fake tail (Sheepawn)
LanguageData.SP_FakeTail.description: A fake tail for Sheepawn made out of wool. It looks awkward and it is difficult to move, but it's better than nothing.
